# isContentDiscarded()

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the content has been discarded.

## Declaration

```swift
func isContentDiscarded() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the content has been discarded; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discarding Content

- **discardContentIfPossible()**: Called to discard the contents of the receiver if the value of the accessed counter is 0.
